怗字的基本解释

怗
tiē
平定；使服帖：“桓公救中国而攘夷狄，卒怗荆。”
安宁：“田里老安怗。”
静：“乃怗然无声。”

怗
zhān
〔怗懘（

怗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiē］
［《廣韻》他協切，入帖，透。］
(1)平服。
(2)安宁；安静。
(3)贴近。
[②]［zhān］
［《集韻》處占切，平鹽，昌。］
见“怗2懘”。'

怗字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　怗； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页380第19
【廣韻】【正韻】他協切【集韻】【韻會】託協切，?音帖。【玉篇】服也，靜也。【公羊傳·僖四年】卒怗荆，以此爲王者之事也。　又【集韻】處占切，音沾。怗滯也。【禮·樂記】宮商角徵羽，五者不亂，則無怗滯之音。

怗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
怗字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
pacific
tiē
Ping Ding; make obedient post: "Huan Gong saves China and throws away Yi Di, and died in Jing Jing."
An Ning: "Old An Da in the field."
Jing: "It's silent."
pacific

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [tiē]
["Guang Yun" he co-cuts, enters the post, and is thorough. ]
(1) Plain clothes.
(2) Tranquility; quiet.
(3) Get close.
[②]［zhān］
["Ji Yun" Chu Zhanqi, Pingyan, Chang. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怗; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 380 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] He Xieqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Support Xieqie, audio note. [Jade articles] Serve and quiet. 【The Story of Gongyang·Xi Four Years】Soldier Daojing, it is also a matter of kings.　[Jiyun] Everywhere is occupied and cut, and the sound is touched. Stupid too. [Ritual and Music] Gong Shang Jiao Zheng Yu, if the five are not chaotic, there will be no lagging sound.
